title: Parenting for a Peaceful World
description: Parenting for a Peaceful World is a fascinating look at how child-rearing customs have shaped societies and major world events. It reveals how children adapt to and are influenced by different parenting styles and how safeguarding their emotional development is the key to creating a more peaceful, harmonious and sustainable world. Practical advice for raising a well-adjusted child includes tips Parenting for a Peaceful World is for parents, child health professionals, teachers, and for adults seeking to heal and grow.
author: Robin Grille
